product_name: Columbia Brooklyn Avenue Safari Jacket - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Blending classic design elements and practical outdoor features, the Columbia Brooklyn Avenue safari jacket sheds water and helps keep you protected during your adventures. Waxed cotton exterior with Omni-Shield(R) treatment resists water and stains to keep you looking and feeling your best; back vent promotes breathability. Adjustable, removable hood provides additional protection; stand-up collar protects your chin and neck when the hood isn't in use. Drawcord at the waist and button tabs at the cuffs create a customizable fit; articlulated elbows offer easy, nonbinding movement. Interior media pocket lets you rock out while on the go. Interior plaid lining adds a touch of style. The Columbia Brooklyn Avenue safari jacket features 2 flap-closure chest pockets and 2 generous, zippered hand pockets. Closeout.
short_description: Blending classic design elements and practical outdoor features, the Columbia Brooklyn Avenue safari jacket sheds water and helps keep you protected during your adventures.
